module.description: Deployment binding the apache server and the test client node(s).

image.description: Apache web server appliance with custom landing page.

target.name: execute
target.content:
#!/bin/sh -xe

default_site_location='/etc/apache2/sites-available/default'
if [ ! -f $default_site_location ]; then
  default_site_location='/etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf'
fi

http_root_location='/var/www/html'
if [ ! -d $http_root_location ]; then
  http_root_location='/var/www'
fi

echo 'Hello from Apache deployed by SlipStream!' > $http_root_location/data.txt

service apache2 stop
port=$(ss-get port)

sed -i -e 's/^Listen.*$/Listen '$port'/' /etc/apache2/ports.conf
sed -i -e 's/^NameVirtualHost.*$/NameVirtualHost *:'$port'/' /etc/apache2/ports.conf
sed -i -e 's/^<VirtualHost.*$/<VirtualHost *:'$port'>/' $default_site_location
service apache2 start
ss-set ready true
url="http://$(ss-get hostname):$port"
ss-set url.service $url
ss-set ss:url.service $url

subTarget.name: execute
subTarget.content:
#!/bin/sh -xe

default_site_location='/etc/apache2/sites-available/default'
if [ ! -f $default_site_location ]; then
  default_site_location='/etc/apache2/sites-available/000-default.conf'
fi

http_root_location='/var/www/html'
if [ ! -d $http_root_location ]; then
  http_root_location='/var/www'
fi

echo 'Hello from Apache deployed by SlipStream!' > $http_root_location/data.txt

service apache2 stop
port=$(ss-get port)

sed -i -e 's/^Listen.*$/Listen '$port'/' /etc/apache2/ports.conf
sed -i -e 's/^NameVirtualHost.*$/NameVirtualHost *:'$port'/' /etc/apache2/ports.conf
sed -i -e 's/^<VirtualHost.*$/<VirtualHost *:'$port'>/' $default_site_location
service apache2 start
ss-set ready true
url="http://$(ss-get hostname):$port"
ss-set url.service $url
ss-set ss:url.service $url

subTarget.name: execute
subTarget.content:
#!/bin/bash -xe

# set the service url to SSH url
url=$(ss-get --timeout=180 url.ssh)
ss-set url.service "${url}"
ss-set ss:url.service "${url}"

image.name: examples/tutorials/service-testing/apache

image.description: Web client tests server connectivity and verifies content.

target.name: onvmadd
execute

subTarget.name: onvmadd
execute
subTarget.content:
#!/bin/bash -xe

# set the service url to SSH url
url=$(ss-get --timeout=180 url.ssh)
ss-set url.service "${url}"
ss-set ss:url.service "${url}"

subTarget.name: execute
